content: make an adorable little mouse in under an hour with this no-sew mouse crochet pattern this quick and easy amigurumi mouse has all of the cuteness and none of the sewing it would make a great addition to your next market/craft fair or a fun gift the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found here 1 on my blog materials * super bulky yarn * dk weight yarn in pink for the nose and tail * 4 5mm crochet hook * 2 5mm crochet hook * 8mm safety eyes * 4 ply yarn in black or black embroidery floss * polyester fiberfill * stitch marker yarn needle scissors the finished item measure approximately 3 7 5cm tall not including the tail item size may vary depending on gauge and materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/crochet-mouse-pattern/
